title: Senior Frontend Developer & Instructor
bio: Rohan Patil is a passionate web developer and educator with over 8 years of experience in front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. He has guided numerous students through practical projects, focusing on responsive design and clean coding practices. Rohanâ€™s teaching approach emphasizes real-world implementation and simplifying complex topics for beginners entering the world of web development.

title: Full Stack Developer & Mentor
bio: Ketan Deshmukh is an experienced software engineer specializing in JavaScript, Android, and full-stack development. With more than 10 years in the industry, he has mentored students to build scalable web and mobile applications. His sessions focus on bridging theoretical knowledge with practical problem-solving, helping learners gain confidence in developing end-to-end solutions.

title: Professor of Computer Science & Data Science Expert
bio: Prof. Sameer Kulkarni has over 25 years of combined academic and industry experience in computer science. His expertise includes software architecture, data analytics, and system design. A dedicated educator, he focuses on helping students build strong analytical thinking and problem-solving skills. His mentoring has shaped countless successful careers in technology and research.

title: UI/UX Designer & Visual Experience Creator
bio: Amit Joshi is an enthusiastic UI/UX designer passionate about crafting visually appealing and user-friendly digital experiences. With a background in computer applications, he combines design aesthetics with usability principles to create interfaces that resonate with users. His goal is to inspire creativity and teach how thoughtful design can improve user engagement and satisfaction.
